channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Firefighters battle devastating Los Angeles wildfires as winds calm somewhat
item.description: Firefighters are battling to control major fires in the Los Angeles area that have killed five people, ravaged communities from the Pacific Coast to Pasadena and caused thousands of people to frantically flee their homes.

item.title: Harrowing escapes from Los Angeles wildfires were made by foot, by car or by the grace of strangers
Fire hydrants ran dry in Southern California just when they were needed most
